item.title: Lara add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "One can never have enough socks," said Dumbledore. "Another Christmas has come and gone and I didn't get a single pair. People will insist on giving me books." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lara add a quote by Carol S. Dweck
item.description: "IF, like those with the growth mindset, you believe you can develop yourself, then you're open to accurate information about your current abilities, even it it's unflattering. What's more, if you're oriented toward learning, as they are, you need accurate information about your current abilities in order to learn effectively" -- Carol S. Dweck
